webpage.para: The very brave amongst you might like to try the following:

listitem.para: Checkout the 'cvstools', 'gentext', 'xmlcharent', and 'dsssl' projects from cvs.docbook.sourceforge.net. Make sure you give them all a common parent directory.

Edit the 'saxon' and 'xjparse' scripts in cvstools so that they work on your system (don't ask me how; if you have to ask, you aren't brave enough. Oh, but I will say this, you can safely edit xjparse so that it doesn't do anything :-)
Fix the things I forgot to mention in this message. Run make again. Repeat until it works. :-)
Try the resulting stylesheet on your favorite test document.
None of the make targets except 'all' are expected to work.
